description: A dashboard for visualizing results from the k6.io load testing tool, using the InfluxDB exporter

targets.query: SELECT min("value") FROM $Measurement WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0
SELECT max("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT percentile("value", 50) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

title: Consolidado Teste de Performance
